markdownRemark.html:
• 500 g potatoes
  • 1/2 tsp salt
  • 1/4 tsp baking powder
  • 1 small egg
  • 3/4 cup all purpose flour

Pierce the potatoes and roast them for 1 hour at 200 C. While still hot, peel them, mash them a mix them with the other ingredients.

Make gnocchi out of the dough.

relatedRecipes.title: Shrimp and gnocchi with garlic parmesan sauce

markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
- **500 g** potatoes
- **1/2 tsp** salt
- **1/4 tsp** baking powder
- 1 small egg
- **3/4 cup** all purpose flour

Pierce the potatoes and roast them for 1 hour at 200 C. While still hot, peel them, mash them a mix them with the other ingredients.

Make gnocchi out of the dough.
